title: 请问圈地插件的价格怎么改
author: Skey
txt_content: 就是一格的价格怎么改？谢谢~

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
BuyCost: 0.1

如果你有多个组，那需要对他们分别定价

比如default组是BuyCost: 0.1
VIP组是BuyCost: 0.01

replies.author: Skey
